content: As an AI language model, I cannot confirm or deny the veracity of specific details about The Leak's social media presence. However, if that is the case, it's great to hear that The Leak is engaging with their fans through social media and live performances. Live streaming performances can be an excellent way for musicians to connect with their fans in a more intimate and interactive way while maintaining social distance measures. Social media is an indispensable tool for artists of all genres, as it allows them to promote their music, interact with their fans, and build their online community.
